item.description:
After enjoying some coffee, lets get a walk in before any football starts.
It could be cold, so you may want to dress in layers.

Let's meet for a Sunday Morning Walk @ Pond Meadow Park! We will be meeting on the Braintree side of PMP by the flagpole near the Ranger Station.

We will walk around the loop twice which totals 3.5 miles all together & takes about 1 hr 5 mins - 1 hr 15 mins.
We will wait about 5 minutes for late arrivals, but please try to be on time.

Sunday, November 21st @ 11:30am
Pond Meadow Park
470 Liberty Street
Braintree, MA 02184
No phone #.
www.pondmeadowpark.org

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Late Morning Walk
